features: [ Multifunctional Bookcase Shelf ]:The Storage shelf is consist of 4-Tiers shelf, which is durable and easy to clean,3 drawers made of linen fabric drawers(NOT WOOD DRAWER),which is more durable than non-woven fabrics.It is lightweight and stable,you can use it for cupboard for kitchen ,file cabinet for office, ,side table for entryway,and bookcase for living room, this shelf can meet all of your needs.

[Large Storage Capacity]:There are 4 large shelves on the rack, and each can support 44 lbs worth of your books lamps, books, microwave ovens and printers. 3 drawer for towel, clothes and other tools or accessories.

[High Quality & Sturdy Construction]:4 shelves are equipped with a back panel that ensures your objects not fall off,anti-tip kit come together to fix the frame onto the wall,to protect your kids safe.The wood board is waterproof, you can wipe it directly with a wet cloth.

[Dimension]: Overall size:22.8" (L) x 11.4" (W) x 46.6" (H) ,and the height of all the shelf is 7.8’’ ,8.2’’, 7.4’’,the drawer dimension is 21.2’’(L) x 11’’(W) x 7.4 ‘’(H）and 10.8(L)x11’’(W)x 7.4’’(H) .The shelf adds extra storage space in your house without consuming the floor space

[Portable & Easy to Assemble]: The package includes all the tools and accessories, you can install it in 20 minutes with the instruction, it has 4 adjustable feet for uneven ground and protect the floor from scratches; For all Furologee Dresser, Order today and get a 1 yearAfter-sales guarantee, 30 days no reason to return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to build. My teen built it by herself. Very sturdy. Goes nicely with her decor. Good amount of space it the drawers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this as my make up, perfume, hair care, and skincare storage!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this find! The shelves house my skincare, hair care, make up, & perfume. The drawers I store rollers, curling irons, blow dryers, etc. it was an overall great purchase! And it was easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, loose items up top beware.
reviews.reviewText: Sleek, effective, affordable, and compact; this dresser/shelf hybrid is great for those who have a small amount of undergarments and foldable clothes. The sleek finish does make easy knock offs/spills though, especially on the top shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these to act as nightstands and I’m very pleased with them. There was an issue with one of them. The holes on one of the pieces were placed on the wrong side so I was unable to put it together. It was easy to put together and equally easy to take apart and with free returns and Amazon’s exchange options, it wasn’t hard to send it back and the new one was delivered the next day. It was a slight inconvenience but these things happen. I let the company know what happened and they were extremely kind about it. Customer service goes a long way so it was appreciated. The replacement was fine and I really like them. Like I said, they were very easy to put together. A lot of the reviews seem to show that the drawers don’t fit but I didn’t have that problem. It’s the perfect blend of storage space and shelves to display decor. These were really a great buy, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The stand is okay, not as deep (depth) as I thought it would be. The drawers are flimsy and may not hold much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these little shelves to go in my RV. They are absolutely perfect for the space that I had for them. I also love the fact that they're lightweight so, they're easy to move to a secure spot when I'm moving the RV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product came with a mold cloud. mold smell got everywhere I laid this box it came in. I had to wash everything including the screws . the drawers aren't usable because of the smell and they don't fit anyways. I want to send it back but i had to throw the box it came in to my garbage container it was horrible moldy. After i cleaned the mold with ammonia off of it I had to wash the rugs it sat on and actually had to take it out side to washing and assemble it. Then I found the mold attached itself to my electric heating unit that I had in the kitchen so I had to wipe that down with ammonia. This was the worst ever. I will never accept a box again that smells this bad. where on earth was this stored. I almost thought it was some kind of chemical weapon the way the mold attached itself to everything. Never again will I buy from this company being unsure where the items are stored is a major factor. Out side of that issue its small which i knew and very nice easy to assemble but the drawers dont really fit and is hard to pull out so since i cant use them anyways because of the mold and they are cloth I will cut wood and stain it for two more shelves. bad experience. not worth 95$ maybe 60$ if it worked and didnt stink

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased this for my office and I love it.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my office as I don't have any shelves there. It's very sleek and fit perfectly for the space I needed it at.
